Miscellaneous Highlights: Dallas Mavericks defeated the Los Angeles Lakers on Monday.
Quentin Grimes contributed six assists in consecutive games.
P.J. Washington scored 22 points and is emerging as a more confident pull-up shooter.
Klay Thompson and Jaden Hardy displayed their ability to catch a groove from the 3-point line in rapid fashion.
Spencer Dinwiddie continued a trend of being a consistent scoring threat against his former team.
